meanings.definition: The seed of the cotton plant, used for extracting oil and as animal feed.
meanings.sent1: Farmers collect cottonseed to make oil and feed animals.
meanings.sent2: The cottonseed was processed to extract oil for cooking.
meanings.sent3: The chickens on the farm happily pecked at the scattered cottonseed.
meanings.sent4: In the field, the cottonseed lay like tiny pearls waiting to be harvested.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of fresh cottonseed filled the barn, enticing the livestock.
